name: Pirates of Gensokyo: THE QUEST FOR THE HEART of AL!CE MARGATRO!D.
name_original: Pirates of Gensokyo: THE QUEST FOR THE HEART of AL!CE MARGATRO!D.
description:
L!CENSE:

 

This Visual Novel is a Sequel/Spiritual Successor to the lauded Touhou Project fangame Pirates of Gensokyo, an ongoing project spearheaded, as of 2020, by TEAM MAGESTIC.

 

All Original and Derivative Works implemented in this Visual Novel were created for this Project and approved during the 2019 Development Cycle. They are protected by Fair Use for non-commercial purposes, as well as ZUN’s guidelines for digital distribution and recreation.

 

All characters belong to ZUN.

 

Featured Artists:

 

ApricotWTF.

VividGlo.

A.J. (sh1).

Enjoy the Journey.

 

[({R.G..||S.M.G.)}]
